channel.title: coronavirus on R que R
channel.description: Recent content in coronavirus on R que R

item.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Dashboard with {flexdashboard} package
item.description:
Re This post presents a dashboard with information on coronavirus. The {coronavirus} package is available on CRAN and comes from The John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering.
Coronavirus Dashboard In this post I present a dashboard with information about the evolution of coronavirus (COVID-19). I use the coronavirus dataset from the {coronavirus} package, available on CRAN. The information comes from The John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE).

item.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Dashboard with {flexdashboard} package (part II)
item.description:
Re The dashboard presented is a continuation of the previous post. The dashboard shows the evolution of confirmed, recovered, active and death cases due to COVID-19 in a selected group of countries.
Coronavirus Dashboard In this post I present a dashboard with information about the evolution of coronavirus (COVID-19). I use the coronavirus dataset from the {coronavirus} package, available on CRAN. The information comes from The John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE).
